reviews.text: We have stayed at the Miravalle Palace Hotel several times and it has become our favourite in Tuscany. In March we stayed there for 5 days, and the hotel did not let us down this time either.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with great view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The view from most guestrooms are breathtaking. (There are a few rooms facing the courtyard, so make sure you get one with a view of the Arno valley.) The hotel is situated in the middle of San Miniato in a building dating back to the Middle Ages.
reviews.title: Fabulous Stay

reviews.text: The food in the restaurant is not fancy, but if you like good tuscan rural cooking, you have come to the the right place. And the view from the restaurant is also great.
reviews.title: Great location great room

reviews.text: The reception staff speak english, and are always helpful. They always go out of their way to make you feel at home.
reviews.title: Best Place to stay
